title: I own a pixel 2xl with a cracked screen, cant factory reset after reboot???
content: tried everything, zero support from google, after restarting device, fingerprint access, not enough...also needs a pin code...screen is broken and unusable...i need to factory reset the phone before going in for service...all my banking information, passwords and the like are free for the taking to the service tech, and whoever else gets their hands on my phone...please help
